name: SAHIN Elyesa

services.title: Web development
services.description: We help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Web Design
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

aboutpara: I'm a web developer passionate about building scalable and efficient web applications using React and TypeScript. With a keen eye for detail and a love for problem-solving, I thrive in fast-paced environments where creativity and innovation are encouraged. When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies and staying up-to-date with the latest industry trends.

resume.description: I build web apps using ReactJS/NextJS and Typescript.

experiences.bullets: Features : CRUD Authentification, Image optimization (multer/sharp), Password hashing (bcrypt) Token generation (JWT)
